description: Main component for a Tic Tac Toe game, allowing play between two human players or against an AI. It manages the game state, UI interactions, and game logic.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: The main functional component that handles the game logic and UI rendering.

methods.name: handleAIMove
methods.description: Calculates the AI's move and updates the board accordingly.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on the game board to make moves.

methods.name: checkGameStatus
methods.description: Checks the current game status for a winner or a draw.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns a string representing the current game status.

methods.name: handleRestart
methods.description: Resets the game to the initial state.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders an individual cell of the game board.
